If one is able to read, recite, and memorize them, then one can be generally familiar with their meaning.

There were also bathing items such as incense and floating bricks, which were fragrant and sour. The sour plum comes from Guangzhou and is suitable for washing the hair.

The six groups saw this and said to each other:

These six monks were all very skilled, and there was no craft they did not know well. When bathing, they used bricks to rub their bodies, and various sounds of the five musical instruments emerged, just like a musician blowing, plucking, and beating.
